alert.note: Alert for Berkeley; Eastern Grant; Eastern Mineral; Hampshire; Hardy; Morgan; Western Grant; Western Mineral (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 3:15AM EST until January 06 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of north central and western Maryland and eastern and panhandle West Virginia. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to begin as snow between 7 and 10 AM. Precipitation may mix with sleet and freezing rain at times during the afternoon, but should remain primarily snow. The snow may be heavy at times during the afternoon, with snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour possible. Precipitation will come to an end during the evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
